hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah:that the Prophet entered upon her and there was a man with her. He said: “Who is this? She said: “This is my brother.” He said: “Look at whom you allow to enter upon you, because the breastfeeding (that makes a person Mahram) is that which satisfies hunger.”

chapter.eng-name: There is no breastfeeding after weaning
